claims.object: Describes actual layers and geometry on the silicon substrate

surface_layer.definition: Describes actual layers and geometry on the silicon substrate to implement a function.

deep_layer.mechanism: Determines the placement and interconnection of components on a silicon substrate.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved from the need to physically realize electronic circuits.

epistemic_metadata.source: Lecture_3-layout_floorplanning - University of Texas at Austin
